title: Anisotropic magnetism at the surface of a non-magnetic bulk insulator
summary: The potential for topological Kondo insulating behavior in d-electron systems has attracted interest in studying the surface states of the correlated insulators FeSb2 and FeSi. While detailed studies and theoretical description of a spin-orbit coupled ferromagnetic surface state have been applied to FeSi, the magnetic properties of the surface states of FeSb2 have not been addressed. Here, we report on the surface magnetic properties of FeSb2, utilizing the surface area dependence of magnetic susceptibility to separate the surface Curie-Weiss temperature dependence from the bulk spin-gap susceptibility. We use these results to further extract the surface magnetic anisotropy of a thin, rough-surfaced single-crystal FeSb2 to compare with the observed magnetotransport anisotropy, and find good agreement between the anisotropy in the surface magnetization and surface magnetotransport. We conclude with evidence of an anomalous Hall contribution to the low-temperature surface transport.

AI.tldr: 该研究通过磁化率测量分离了FeSb2的表面与体磁性质，发现表面磁各向异性与表面磁输运各向异性一致，并观察到低温表面输运中的反常霍尔贡献。
AI.motivation: d电子系统中的拓扑近藤绝缘体行为潜力引发了人们对FeSb2和FeSi表面态的研究兴趣。虽然FeSi已有详细研究和理论描述，但FeSb2表面态的磁性质尚未得到研究。
AI.method: 利用磁化率的表面积依赖性分离表面居里-外斯温度依赖性和体自旋隙磁化率，进一步提取薄粗糙表面单晶FeSb2的表面磁各向异性，并与观测到的磁输运各向异性进行比较。
AI.result: 发现表面磁化各向异性与表面磁输运各向异性之间存在良好一致性，并获得了低温表面输运中存在反常霍尔贡献的证据。
AI.conclusion: FeSb2表面态表现出与磁输运各向异性一致的磁各向异性，且低温表面输运包含反常霍尔贡献，这为理解d电子系统拓扑近藤绝缘体行为提供了重要信息。

title: Emergent Topological Complexity in the Barabasi-Albert Model with Higher-Order Interactions
summary: We examine the homological structure of the Barabasi-Albert model, focusing on the time evolution of $Δ$-dimensional simplices and topological holes as functions of time $t$ and the attachment parameter $m$ (the number of edges added by each incoming node). Numerical simulations reveal a non-trivial topological transition (TT) in the $(Δ, m)$ plane, marking a change from a topologically trivial regime to non-trivial topology. This transition signals the emergence of topological complexity in the model, where higher-order structures develop self-similarly across scales. Beyond this transition, the network exhibits self-similar topological growth, evidenced by a power-law decay in the increments of $Δ$-simplices with $m$-dependent exponents. An analogous transition occurs in the Betti numbers, which display self-similar behavior near the TT and an arctangent dependence farther from it. Based on simulation data, we propose explicit scaling relations describing the behavior of both $Δ$-simplices and Betti numbers near the TT. Overall, the analysis reveals a rich, gapful topological transition structure, where topological quantities exhibit discrete jumps at the transition point.

AI.tldr: BA模型存在非平凡拓扑相变，从平凡拓扑过渡到非平凡拓扑，表现出自相似拓扑增长和幂律衰减行为。
AI.motivation: 研究Barabási-Albert模型的同调结构，探索其高维单纯形和拓扑洞的时间演化，揭示网络拓扑复杂性的涌现机制。
AI.method: 通过数值模拟分析Δ维单纯形和贝蒂数随时间和连接参数m的演化，识别拓扑相变点，提出标度关系描述相变附近行为。
AI.result: 发现(Δ,m)平面存在拓扑相变，相变后网络呈现自相似拓扑增长，Δ单纯形增量呈幂律衰减，贝蒂数在相变附近自相似，远离时呈反正切依赖。
AI.conclusion: BA模型展现出丰富的间隙拓扑相变结构，拓扑量在相变点发生离散跳跃，揭示了网络拓扑复杂性的涌现机制。

title: Ab Initio Auxiliary-Field Quantum Monte Carlo in the Thermodynamic Limit
summary: Ab initio auxiliary-field quantum Monte Carlo (AFQMC) is a systematically improvable many-body method, but its application to extended solids has been severely limited by unfavorable computational scaling and memory requirements that obstruct direct access to the thermodynamic and complete-basis-set limits. By combining tensor hypercontraction via interpolative separable density fitting with $\mathbf{k}$-point symmetry, we reduce the computational and memory scaling of ab initio AFQMC for solids to $O(N^3)$ and $O(N^2)$ with arbitrary basis, respectively, comparable to diffusion Monte Carlo. This enables direct and simultaneous thermodynamic-limit and complete-basis-set AFQMC calculations across insulating, metallic, and strongly correlated solids, without embedding, local approximations, empirical finite-size corrections, or composite schemes. Our results establish AFQMC as a general-purpose, systematically improvable alternative to diffusion Monte Carlo and coupled-cluster methods for predictive ab initio simulations of solids, enabling accurate energies and magnetic observables within a unified framework.

AI.tldr: 通过张量超收缩和k点对称性，将固体ab initio AFQMC的计算和内存复杂度分别降至O(N³)和O(N²)，使其能够直接计算热力学极限和完全基组极限，成为DMC和耦合簇方法的通用替代方案。
AI.motivation: 传统AFQMC方法在应用于扩展固体时面临计算复杂度高（不利的计算标度和内存需求）的问题，难以直接达到热力学极限和完全基组极限，限制了其在固体系统中的应用。
AI.method: 结合张量超收缩（通过插值可分离密度拟合实现）和k点对称性，将ab initio AFQMC的计算复杂度降至O(N³)，内存需求降至O(N²)，无需嵌入、局域近似、经验有限尺寸修正或复合方案。
AI.result: 实现了对绝缘体、金属和强关联固体的直接、同时的热力学极限和完全基组极限AFQMC计算，计算复杂度和内存需求与扩散蒙特卡洛方法相当。
AI.conclusion: AFQMC成为扩散蒙特卡洛和耦合簇方法的通用、系统可改进的替代方案，能够在统一框架内提供准确的能量和磁学可观测量，实现固体的预测性ab initio模拟。

title: Generative Inverse Estimation of 3D Atomic Coordination from Near-Edge Spectra via Equivariant Diffusion Models
summary: Extracting 3D atomic coordinates from spectroscopic data is a longstanding inverse problem. We present an equivariant diffusion model that generates site-specific 3D structures directly from near-edge spectra (ELNES/XANES). Trained on Si-O crystals, the model achieves radial accuracy comparable to Extended X-ray Absorption Fine Structure (EXAFS) (RMSD ~0.06 Å) but with superior coordination number precision (errors < 4.3% vs. EXAFS ~20%). Crucially, it reconstructs full 3D geometries including bond angles, overcoming the limitations of 1D radial distribution analysis. The model demonstrates robust out-of-distribution generalization, accurately predicting local structures in amorphous systems despite being trained exclusively on crystalline lattices. Application to experimental O K-edge spectra from α-quartz validates practical applicability. This generative approach outperforms template matching and establishes automated, quantitative 3D structure determination from spectroscopic data.

AI.tldr: 提出一种等变扩散模型，直接从近边光谱（ELNES/XANES）生成位点特定的3D原子结构，在Si-O晶体上训练，精度优于传统EXAFS方法，并能重建完整3D几何结构。
AI.motivation: 从光谱数据提取3D原子坐标是一个长期存在的逆问题。传统方法如EXAFS只能提供1D径向分布信息，无法获得完整的3D几何结构（包括键角等）。需要一种能够直接从光谱数据生成完整3D结构的方法。
AI.method: 使用等变扩散模型，直接从近边光谱（ELNES/XANES）生成位点特定的3D结构。模型在Si-O晶体上进行训练，能够处理光谱数据并生成相应的原子坐标。
AI.result: 径向精度与EXAFS相当（RMSD ~0.06 Å），但配位数精度显著优于EXAFS（误差<4.3% vs. EXAFS ~20%）。模型能够重建完整的3D几何结构包括键角，并在非晶体系中表现出良好的泛化能力，尽管只在晶体晶格上训练。在α-石英的实验O K-edge光谱上验证了实用性。
AI.conclusion: 这种生成方法超越了模板匹配，建立了从光谱数据自动、定量确定3D结构的新途径，克服了传统1D径向分布分析的局限性，为材料科学中的结构表征提供了有力工具。

title: Finding Molecules with Specific Properties: Simulated Annealing vs. Evolution
comment: In the companion proceedings of the Genetic and Evolutionary Computation Conference (GECCO '25)
summary: We compare the ability of a simulated annealing program and an evolutionary algorithm to find molecules with large molecular average hyperpolarizabilities. This property is an important component of nonlinear optical materials. Both optimization programs represent molecules as SMILES strings, a method that is widely used by chemists to describe molecular structure using short ASCII strings. Our results suggest that both approaches are comparable and can be used to solve a variety of more realistic problems of interest to chemists and material scientists.

AI.tldr: 比较模拟退火和进化算法在寻找具有大分子平均超极化率分子方面的能力，两者都使用SMILES字符串表示分子结构
AI.motivation: 分子平均超极化率是非线性光学材料的重要特性，需要高效的方法来寻找具有该特性的分子
AI.method: 使用模拟退火程序和进化算法，将分子表示为SMILES字符串（化学家广泛使用的ASCII字符串表示法）
AI.result: 两种方法表现相当，都能有效寻找具有大分子平均超极化率的分子
AI.conclusion: 模拟退火和进化算法都可以用于解决化学家和材料科学家感兴趣的各种更现实的问题

title: Exciton-Selective Phonon Coupling in a Lead Halide Perovskite
summary: Exciton-phonon interactions govern the optical response of semiconductors, yet disentangling multiple coupling channels in lead halide perovskites remains challenging. We investigate CsPbBr3 microcrystals using photoluminescence, Raman and reflectance spectroscopy at low temperature, revealing the simultaneous presence of high-energy and Rashba excitons, each accompanied by distinct phonon replica series. High-energy exciton replicas are uniquely spaced by approximately 9 meV, whereas Rashba exciton replicas exhibit a characteristic approximately 6 meV spacing, indicating the specificity of the exciton-phonon coupling. Unsupervised machine learning applied to a large low-temperature photoluminescence dataset reveals these replica features are prevalent. With increasing temperature, replica features broaden and merge, evolving into a dominant longitudinal optical phonon coupling regime at room temperature. This work establishes direct spectroscopic evidence for concurrent, exciton-specific phonon coupling within a single material, offering new pathways to engineer light-matter interactions for optoelectronic and phonon-photon-based quantum device applications.

AI.tldr: 该研究通过光谱学方法揭示了CsPbBr3微晶中同时存在高能激子和Rashba激子，每种激子都有特定的声子复制系列，并发现了激子-声子耦合的特异性。
AI.motivation: 虽然激子-声子相互作用主导半导体的光学响应，但在铅卤钙钛矿中分离多个耦合通道仍然具有挑战性。研究旨在揭示CsPbBr3中不同激子与声子的特异性耦合机制。
AI.method: 使用低温光致发光、拉曼和反射光谱研究CsPbBr3微晶体，并结合无监督机器学习分析大量低温光致发光数据集。
AI.result: 发现高能激子复制品间距约9 meV，Rashba激子复制品间距约6 meV，表明激子-声子耦合的特异性。随着温度升高，复制特征展宽合并，在室温下演变为主导的纵向光学声子耦合机制。
AI.conclusion: 该工作首次在同一材料中建立了并发、激子特异性声子耦合的直接光谱证据，为光电子和声子-光子量子器件应用中的光-物质相互作用工程提供了新途径。

title: Entanglement negativity in decohered topological states
summary: We investigate universal entanglement signatures of mixed-state phases obtained by decohering pure-state topological order (TO), focusing on topological corrections to logarithmic entanglement negativity and mutual information: topological entanglement negativity (TEN) and topological mutual information (TMI). For Abelian TOs under decoherence, we develop a replica field-theory framework based on a doubled-state construction that relates TEN and TMI to the quantum dimensions of domain-wall defects between decoherence-induced topological boundary conditions, yielding general expressions in the strong-decoherence regime. We further compute TEN and TMI exactly for decohered $G$-graded string-net states, including cases with non-Abelian anyons. We interpret the results within the strong one-form-symmetry framework for mixed-state TOs: TMI probes the total quantum dimension of the emergent premodular anyon theory, whereas TEN detects only its modular part.

AI.tldr: 研究退相干纯态拓扑序得到的混合态相中的普适纠缠特征，重点关注对数纠缠负性和互信息中的拓扑修正：拓扑纠缠负性(TEN)和拓扑互信息(TMI)。
AI.motivation: 研究退相干纯态拓扑序产生的混合态相中的普适纠缠特征，理解拓扑纠缠负性和拓扑互信息如何表征混合态拓扑序的性质。
AI.method: 使用基于双态构造的副本场论框架，分析阿贝尔拓扑序在退相干下的情况；精确计算退相干G-分级弦网态的TEN和TMI；在一形式对称性框架下解释结果。
AI.result: TMI探测涌现预模任意子理论的总量子维度，而TEN仅探测其模部分；在强退相干区域得到一般表达式；对包含非阿贝尔任意子的情况进行了精确计算。
AI.conclusion: 拓扑纠缠负性和拓扑互信息提供了混合态拓扑序的不同方面信息：TMI反映总量子维度，TEN反映模结构，为理解退相干拓扑序提供了新的理论框架。

title: Quantum-classical correspondence for spins at finite temperatures with application to Monte Carlo simulations
summary: We consider quantum-to-classical mapping for an arbitrary system of interacting spins at finite temperatures. We prove that, in the large-$S$ limit, the asymptotic form of the partition function coincides with that of a classical model for spins of length $S_C=\sqrt{S(S+1)}$. Quantum corrections to the leading term form a series in powers of $1/[S(S+1)]$. This representation provides a rigorous basis for classical modeling of realistic magnetic Hamiltonians. As an application, the classical Monte Carlo simulations are performed to compute transition temperatures for several topical materials with known interaction parameters, including MnF$_2$, MnTe, Rb$_2$MnF$_4$, MnPSe$_3$, FePS$_3$, FePSe$_3$, CoPS$_3$, CrSBr, and CrI$_3$. The resulting transition temperatures show good agreement with experimental data.

AI.tldr: 该论文证明了在自旋S较大时，量子自旋系统的配分函数渐近形式与经典模型一致，为磁性材料的经典建模提供了理论基础，并通过蒙特卡洛模拟验证了多种材料的相变温度。
AI.motivation: 为磁性材料的经典建模提供严格的理论基础，解决量子自旋系统在有限温度下的经典近似问题，使经典模拟方法能够更准确地预测实际材料的相变行为。
AI.method: 采用量子到经典的映射方法，证明在大S极限下，量子自旋系统的配分函数渐近形式与长度为S_C=√[S(S+1)]的经典自旋模型一致。量子修正项构成1/[S(S+1)]的幂级数。应用经典蒙特卡洛模拟计算多种材料的相变温度。
AI.result: 理论证明为经典建模提供了严格基础。对MnF2、MnTe、Rb2MnF4、MnPSe3、FePS3、FePSe3、CoPS3、CrSBr、CrI3等材料的蒙特卡洛模拟得到的相变温度与实验数据吻合良好。
AI.conclusion: 该研究为磁性材料的经典建模建立了严格的理论框架，证明了经典模拟方法在预测实际材料相变温度方面的有效性，为材料设计和研究提供了实用工具。

title: Dislocation-ledge coupling drives non-conservative migration of semicoherent precipitate interfaces
summary: Precipitate shape and size control the strength and stability of many structural alloys, yet the microscopic mechanism by which semicoherent precipitate interfaces migrate remains unclear. In particular, how dense interfacial dislocation networks move while accommodating transformation strain has resisted direct, time-resolved characterization. Here, we show that non-conservative motion of interfacial dislocations is intrinsically coupled to the nucleation and lateral propagation of nanoscale growth ledges, providing a defect-based kinetic description of lath growth. Phase-field-crystal simulations of a prototypical face-centered cubic/body-centered cubic (FCC/BCC) transformation resolve strongly anisotropic interface kinetics: the end face advances continuously along the lath long axis, whereas facets thicken by discrete ledge sweeps accompanied by mixed glide-climb reactions in a closed dislocation network. Crystallographic analyses predict the dislocation arrangements, rationalize the anisotropy via the geometry of misfit localization, and show how dislocation motion accommodates the transformation strain. In situ transmission electron microscopy of austenite precipitates in duplex stainless steel captures rapid ledge propagation on habit planes, consistent with the predicted migration mode. Our results bridge point-defect transport, dislocation reactions, and interface mobility, enabling quantitative, transferable predictions of precipitate morphology evolution.

AI.tldr: 本文揭示了半共格析出相界面迁移的微观机制：界面位错的非保守运动与纳米级生长台阶的形核和横向传播相耦合，为板条生长提供了基于缺陷的动力学描述。
AI.motivation: 析出相的形貌和尺寸控制着许多结构合金的强度和稳定性，但半共格析出相界面迁移的微观机制尚不清楚。特别是，密集的界面位错网络如何在适应相变应变的同时移动，一直缺乏直接、时间分辨的表征。
AI.method: 采用相场晶体模拟研究典型的FCC/BCC相变，结合晶体学分析预测位错排列，并通过原位透射电子显微镜观察双相不锈钢中奥氏体析出相的生长过程。
AI.result: 揭示了强烈的界面动力学各向异性：板条长轴方向的端面连续前进，而侧面则通过离散的台阶扫掠增厚，伴随闭合位错网络中的混合滑移-攀移反应。原位TEM观察捕捉到习惯面上快速的台阶传播，与预测的迁移模式一致。
AI.conclusion: 该研究将点缺陷传输、位错反应和界面迁移性联系起来，实现了对析出相形貌演化的定量、可转移预测，为理解半共格界面迁移机制提供了新的视角。

title: Inverse Engineering of Optical Constants in Photochromic Micron-Scale Hybrid Films
summary: Photochromic materials enable dynamic optical modulation through reversible transitions between distinct absorption states, with broad potential for smart windows, adaptive optics, and reconfigurable photonic devices. Micron-scale photochromic hybrid films present a particularly attractive platform for these applications, combining straightforward preparation with substantial optical modulation and scalability for high-volume fabrication. However, rational design of such films remains fundamentally constrained by the absence of well-defined optical constants. Unlike homogeneous thin films, micron-scale hybrid photochromic materials comprise active particles dispersed non-uniformly within polymer matrices. Conventional first-principles electromagnetic simulations face substantial computational costs and discrepancies between simulated and experimental particle distributions. Here, we introduce a data-driven framework that extracts effective optical constants directly from minimal experimental transmittance measurements. Our dual-state effective model approximates the complex inhomogeneous photochromic layer as a compressed homogeneous medium characterized by pseudo-refractive indices and pseudo-extinction coefficients for both pristine and UV-irradiated states. Through systematic optimization against experimental data from tungsten oxide-polyvinylpyrrolidone hybrid films, we determine wavelength-dependent pseudo-optical constants and compression ratios that enable accurate prediction of optical modulation within the tested thickness range. Our methodology establishes a framework for engineering hybrid photochromic systems and demonstrates how data-driven modeling can overcome limitations in characterizing complex nanostructured materials.

AI.tldr: 提出数据驱动框架，从实验透射率测量中提取混合光致变色薄膜的有效光学常数，解决传统模拟计算成本高且与实验分布不匹配的问题。
AI.motivation: 微米级混合光致变色薄膜在智能窗户、自适应光学等领域有广泛应用潜力，但其合理设计受到缺乏明确光学常数的限制。传统第一性原理电磁模拟计算成本高，且模拟与实验粒子分布存在差异。
AI.method: 提出数据驱动框架，通过最小实验透射率测量提取有效光学常数。采用双态有效模型，将复杂非均匀光致变色层近似为压缩均匀介质，用伪折射率和伪消光系数表征原始态和紫外辐照态。
AI.result: 通过系统优化氧化钨-聚乙烯吡咯烷酮混合薄膜的实验数据，确定了波长相关的伪光学常数和压缩比，能够在测试厚度范围内准确预测光学调制性能。
AI.conclusion: 该方法为工程化混合光致变色系统建立了框架，展示了数据驱动建模如何克服复杂纳米结构材料表征的局限性。

title: Exceptional horns in $n$-root graphene and Lieb photonic ring lattices
summary: We present a systematic construction of non-Hermitian tight-binding lattices whose Bloch spectra are $n$th roots of those of Hermitian parent two-dimensional (2D) lattices, namely graphene and the Lieb lattice. The $n$-roots of these models are constructed from connecting loop modules of unidirectional couplings whose geometrical arrangements match that of the corresponding parent system. Their energy spectrum is shown to consist of $n$ rotated and equivalent branches in the complex energy plane, each matching the real spectrum of the parent model when raised to the $n$th power, together with extra zero-energy flat bands (FBs) accounted for by the generalized index theorem. We show how the low-energy Dirac cones of the parent models translate, for an appropriate choice of phase configuration for the couplings of the $n$-root lattices, as what we call an "exceptional horn" appearing at each branch, with the central Dirac point (DP) converted into zero-energy exceptional points (EPs) of order $n$ or higher at high-symmetry momenta. These exceptional horns reflect the behavior of low-lying excitations that scale with momentum as $E\sim\vert \mathbf{q}\vert^{\frac{1}{n}}$, with $n\geq 3$, as opposed to the linear massless modes that characterize a Dirac cone. Moreover, we derive analytic expressions for the associated Landau levels (LLs), whose energies scale with magnetic flux as $E\simφ^{\frac{1}{2n}}$. For the case of the $n$-root Lieb lattice, the zeroth LL is shown to be exceptional. These results are analytically derived for both $n$-root models and numerically demonstrated for certain values of $n$. Finally, we propose a realistic photonic implementation based on coupled ring resonators with a split configuration of optical gain and loss.

AI.tldr: 提出了一种系统构建非厄米紧束缚晶格的方法，其布洛赫谱是二维厄米母晶格（石墨烯和Lieb晶格）谱的n次方根，产生具有特殊能带结构和异常点的奇异物理现象。
AI.motivation: 研究如何从厄米晶格构造非厄米晶格，探索其独特的能带结构和物理特性，特别是将狄拉克锥转化为高阶异常点，以及相关的朗道能级行为。
AI.method: 通过连接单向耦合的环路模块，构建n次方根晶格模型，其几何排列与对应的母系统匹配。使用广义指标定理分析零能平带，解析推导朗道能级，并提出基于耦合环形谐振器的光子实现方案。
AI.result: n次方根模型的能谱包含n个旋转等效分支，每个分支的n次方匹配母模型的实谱。低能狄拉克锥转化为"异常角"，激发能量按动量标度E∼|q|^{1/n}。朗道能级能量按磁通量标度E∼φ^{1/(2n)}，n次方根Lieb晶格的零阶朗道能级是异常的。
AI.conclusion: 成功构建了具有奇异物理特性的非厄米晶格模型，展示了从厄米到非厄米系统的系统转换方法，为探索高阶异常点和非线性色散关系提供了新平台，并提出了可行的实验实现方案。

title: A Tale of Two Plateaus: Competing Orders in Spin-1 and Spin-$\tfrac{3}{2}$ Pyrochlore Magnets
summary: We use large-scale density-matrix renormalization group simulations with bond dimensions up to $20\ 000$ to determine the magnetization curves of spin-1 and spin-$\tfrac{3}{2}$ pyrochlore Heisenberg antiferromagnets. Both models exhibit a robust half-magnetization plateau, and we find that the same 16-site state (quadrupled unit cell) is selected in both cases on the largest 64-site cubic cluster we consider for the plateau state. This contrasts sharply with the effective quantum dimer model prediction which favors the ``R'' state, and demonstrates the breakdown of the perturbative mechanism at the Heisenberg point. These results provide a nonperturbative characterization of field-induced phases in pyrochlore magnets and predictive guidance for spin-1 and spin-$\tfrac{3}{2}$ materials.

AI.tldr: 通过大规模DMRG模拟研究自旋-1和自旋-3/2烧绿石海森堡反铁磁体的磁化曲线，发现两者都存在稳健的半磁化平台，且平台态均为16位点态，与量子二聚体模型预测的"R"态不同，表明微扰机制在海森堡点处失效。
AI.motivation: 研究烧绿石磁体中场诱导相的非微扰特性，为自旋-1和自旋-3/2材料提供预测指导。传统量子二聚体模型的微扰预测与实际情况存在差异，需要非微扰方法进行准确描述。
AI.method: 使用大规模密度矩阵重整化群模拟，键维度高达20,000，计算自旋-1和自旋-3/2烧绿石海森堡反铁磁体的磁化曲线。在64位点立方簇上分析半磁化平台态。
AI.result: 两个模型都表现出稳健的半磁化平台，平台态均为16位点态（四倍原胞），这与量子二聚体模型预测的"R"态形成鲜明对比，证明微扰机制在海森堡点处失效。
AI.conclusion: 研究提供了烧绿石磁体中场诱导相的非微扰表征，为自旋-1和自旋-3/2材料提供了预测指导，揭示了微扰方法在描述海森堡点物理时的局限性。

title: Negative Strain-Rate Sensitivity in Metallic Glasses Driven by Rejuvenation-Relaxation Competition: Kinetic Monte Carlo Simulations and a Minimal Effective Model
comment: 15 pages, 13 figures, also available as SSRN preprint (https://doi.org/10.2139/ssrn.6250723)
summary: When strain-rate sensitivity (SRS) is negative in metallic glasses, the material becomes weaker as the deformation rate increases, leading to accelerated plastic deformation and, eventually, catastrophic fracture. In this study, we elucidate the mechanism underlying the negative SRS using micromechanics-based kinetic Monte Carlo simulations that couple heterogeneous randomized shear transformation zone (STZ) models for metallic glasses. The model accounted for both the thermomechanical structural rejuvenation and relaxation of the energy barrier for thermal activation of STZs, incorporating a Kohlrausch-Williams-Watts (KWW)-type relaxation function. The present simulations systematically reproduce the dependence of flow stresses on strain rate, temperature, and the form of the relaxation function. The SRS tends to decrease at high strain rates and low temperatures in the simulations, and negative SRS appears when a compressed-exponential relaxation function is employed. Shear localization also appears; however, the conditions under which the observed localization emerges do not fully coincide with those leading to the negative SRS, leaving the dominant factor unclear. To clarify the dominant factor, we introduce a simplified theoretical model that reproduces flow stresses consistent with the simulation results. An analytical expression derived from the theoretical model reveals that negative SRS originates primarily from the temporal evolution of the activation barrier. Specifically, negative SRS arises when the timescale of external loading exceeds that of STZ relaxation.

AI.tldr: 该研究通过模拟和理论模型揭示了金属玻璃中负应变率敏感性的机制，发现当外部加载时间尺度超过剪切转变区松弛时间尺度时，负应变率敏感性主要源于激活势垒的时间演化。
AI.motivation: 金属玻璃中的负应变率敏感性会导致材料在变形速率增加时变弱，引发加速塑性变形和灾难性断裂。理解这一现象的机制对于材料设计和应用至关重要。
AI.method: 采用基于微力学的动力学蒙特卡洛模拟，耦合异质随机剪切转变区模型，考虑热机械结构再年轻化和松弛效应，并引入KWW型松弛函数。同时建立了简化的理论模型进行分析。
AI.result: 模拟成功再现了流动应力对应变率、温度和松弛函数形式的依赖性。在高应变率和低温条件下，应变率敏感性降低；当使用压缩指数松弛函数时出现负应变率敏感性。理论模型分析表明，负应变率敏感性主要源于激活势垒的时间演化，当外部加载时间尺度超过STZ松弛时间尺度时出现。
AI.conclusion: 金属玻璃中的负应变率敏感性主要源于激活势垒的时间演化，而非剪切局部化。当外部加载时间尺度超过剪切转变区松弛时间尺度时，就会出现负应变率敏感性，这为理解和预测金属玻璃的力学行为提供了重要见解。

title: Understanding the influence of yttrium on the dominant twinning mode and local mechanical field evolution in extruded Mg-Y alloys
summary: Twinning is a primary deformation mechanism in Mg alloys. This study focuses on tension twins during uniaxial compression of Mg-Y alloys, with three key aspects: the orientation specificity of twin grains, the relative evolution of CRSS with increasing Y content, and the local stress and strain evolution at twin sites. Experimental characterization and crystal plasticity modeling were performed. In Mg-7wt.%Y, TT2-{112-1} tension twins were observed in addition to the common TT1-{101-2} twins. Increasing Y suppressed TT1 formation while promoting TT2 activity. A previously unreported group of crystallographic orientations with a higher global Schmid factor for <c+a> slip was identified, which exhibited TT1 twinning with increasing compression strain. To elucidate Y effects on twin activity and local mechanical fields, both TT1 and TT2 tension twin modes were incorporated into PRISMS-Plasticity, an open-source, finite element-based crystal plasticity solver. Four binary Mg-Y alloys were modeled under compression, and statistical analysis was conducted to correlate initial orientations, stress-strain distributions, and twin activities as functions of Y concentration. The plasticity analysis revealed that increasing Y decreases the CRSS ratio of prismatic and pyramidal slip relative to TT1 twinning, while the slip-to-twin CRSS ratio for TT2 increases, thereby serving as a potential indicator of differential twin activity with Y addition in Mg alloys. Additionally, despite their small volume fraction, TT2 twin sites were predicted higher local strain accumulation locally, relative to the representative volume element and TT1 twins, suggesting their potential influence on localized phenomena such as recrystallization or twin nucleation. These findings provide insight into local mechanical behavior in Mg alloys and support alloy design for advanced engineering applications.

AI.tldr: 研究镁钇合金压缩变形中张力孪晶行为，发现钇含量增加抑制常见TT1孪晶但促进TT2孪晶，并通过晶体塑性模拟揭示了钇对孪晶活性和局部力学场的影响机制。
AI.motivation: 孪晶是镁合金主要变形机制，但钇元素对张力孪晶行为的影响机制尚不明确。研究旨在揭示镁钇合金中不同张力孪晶模式的取向特异性、临界分切应力演变规律以及局部应力应变演化特征。
AI.method: 采用实验表征与晶体塑性模拟相结合的方法：实验观察Mg-7wt.%Y合金中TT1和TT2张力孪晶；使用开源有限元晶体塑性求解器PRISMS-Plasticity模拟四种二元镁钇合金压缩变形，统计分析初始取向、应力应变分布与孪晶活性的关系。
AI.result: 发现钇含量增加抑制TT1孪晶形成但促进TT2孪晶活动；识别出具有较高<c+a>滑移全局Schmid因子的新取向组；模拟显示钇增加降低棱柱/锥面滑移相对于TT1的CRSS比，但提高滑移相对于TT2的CRSS比；TT2孪晶位点虽体积分数小但局部应变积累更高。
AI.conclusion: 钇通过改变滑移与孪晶的CRSS比值差异性地影响不同张力孪晶模式活性，TT2孪晶位点的高局部应变积累可能影响再结晶或孪晶形核等局部现象，为镁合金局部力学行为理解和先进工程应用合金设计提供指导。

title: Unveiling and quantifying the topology-dependent pre-melting of nanoparticles
summary: The melting of metallic nanoparticles is governed by surface pre-melting, a phenomenon traditionally modeled as the isotropic growth of a uniform liquid shell. Challenging this classical view, we report facet-dependent surface pre-melting in hexagonal close-packed Co nanoparticles, arising from the structural heterogeneity of the nanoparticle surface. Characterizing melting in molecular dynamics simulations (500 to 6000 atoms), we observe the onset of surface mobility, starting as low as $0.2\times T_{M,\infty}$ (the bulk melting point), driven by the early disordering of stepped $\{01\bar{1}1\}$ facets. We found that these facets consistently melt at temperatures nearly 200 Kelvin lower than flat $\{0001\}$ facets, regardless of particle size, and relate facets melting temperatures to the nanoparticle size via a 2D extension of the Gibbs-Thomson relation. We determine a critical liquid layer thickness that triggers the melting of the entire nanoparticle, which is found to be size-dependent. Our results confirm the recent experimental observation of the surface pre-melting effect, and extend it to anisotropic particles with different facet orientations.

AI.tldr: 研究发现六方密堆积钴纳米粒子的表面预熔化具有晶面依赖性，与传统各向同性均匀液壳模型不同，阶梯{01̄11}晶面比平坦{0001}晶面早熔化近200K。
AI.motivation: 挑战传统表面预熔化的各向同性均匀液壳模型，揭示纳米粒子表面结构异质性导致的晶面依赖性熔化行为。
AI.method: 采用分子动力学模拟（500-6000个原子），表征熔化过程，观察表面流动性起始温度，分析不同晶面的熔化温度差异。
AI.result: 发现阶梯{01̄11}晶面在温度低至0.2×TM,∞时开始无序化，比平坦{0001}晶面早熔化近200K；建立了晶面熔化温度与纳米粒子尺寸的二维Gibbs-Thomson关系；确定了触发整个纳米粒子熔化的临界液层厚度。
AI.conclusion: 证实了表面预熔化效应的实验观察，并将其扩展到具有不同晶面取向的各向异性粒子，揭示了晶面依赖性的表面预熔化机制。

title: Superexchanges and Charge Transfer in the La$_3$Ni$_2$O$_7$ Thin Films
summary: The recent discovery of ambient-pressure superconductivity with $T_c$ above 40 K in La$_3$Ni$_2$O$_7$ thin films represents a significant advance in the field of nickelate superconductor. Motivated by the experimental reports, here we study an 11-band $d-p$ Hubbard model with tight-binding parameters derived from \textit{ab initio} calculations, using large scale determinant quantum Monte Carlo and cellular dynamical mean-field theory. Our results reveal that the major superexchange couplings in La$_3$Ni$_2$O$_7$ thin films can be substantially weaker than in the bulk material at 29.5 Gpa. Specifically, the out-of-plane antiferromagnetic correlation between Ni$-d_{3z^2-r^2}$ orbitals is reduced by about 27\% in film, while the in-plane magnetic correlations remain largely unaffected. We evaluate the corresponding antiferromagnetic coupling constants, $J_{\perp}$ and $J_{\parallel}$ using perturbation theory. With regard to charge transfer properties, we find that the biaxial compression in films reduces charge transfer gap. We also resolve the orbital distribution of doped holes and electrons among the in-plane (Ni$-d_{x^2-y^2}$ and O$-p_x/p_y$) and the out-of-plane (Ni$-d_{3z^2-r^2}$ and O$-p_z$) orbitals, uncovering a pronounced particle-hole asymmetry. Theses findings lay a groundwork for the study of low-energy $t-J$ model of La$_3$Ni$_2$O$_7$ films and provide key insights into the understanding of physical distinctions between the film and bulk bilayer nickelates.

AI.tldr: 该研究通过量子蒙特卡洛和动力学平均场理论，揭示了La₃Ni₂O₇薄膜中磁交换耦合比块材弱约27%，电荷转移隙减小，并发现轨道间的粒子-空穴不对称性。
AI.motivation: 受实验发现La₃Ni₂O₇薄膜在常压下具有40K以上超导转变温度的启发，研究薄膜与块材在物理性质上的差异，特别是磁交换耦合和电荷转移特性的变化。
AI.method: 采用基于第一性原理计算的11轨道d-p Hubbard模型，结合大规模行列式量子蒙特卡洛方法和元胞动力学平均场理论进行计算分析。
AI.result: 薄膜中Ni-d₃z²-r²轨道间的面外反铁磁关联比29.5GPa高压下的块材弱约27%，而面内磁关联基本不变；双轴压缩减小了电荷转移隙；揭示了掺杂空穴和电子在面内和面外轨道分布上的显著粒子-空穴不对称性。
AI.conclusion: 这些发现为研究La₃Ni₂O₇薄膜的低能t-J模型奠定了基础，并提供了理解薄膜与块材双层镍酸盐物理差异的关键见解。

title: AI-Driven Structure Refinement of X-ray Diffraction
summary: Artificial intelligence can rapidly propose candidate phases and structures from X-ray diffraction (XRD), but these hypotheses often fail in downstream refinement because peak intensities cannot be stably assigned under severe overlap and diffraction consistency is enforced only weakly. Here we introduce WPEM, a physics-constrained whole-pattern decomposition and refinement workflow that turns Bragg's law into an explicit constraint within a batch expectation--maximization framework. WPEM models the full profile as a probabilistic mixture density and iteratively infers component-resolved intensities while keeping peak centres Bragg-consistent, producing a continuous, physically admissible intensity representation that remains stable in heavily overlapped regions and in the presence of mixed radiation or multiple phases. We benchmark WPEM on standard reference patterns (\ce{PbSO4} and \ce{Tb2BaCoO5}), where it yields lower $R_{\mathrm{p}}$/$R_{\mathrm{wp}}$ than widely used packages (FullProf and TOPAS) under matched refinement conditions. We further demonstrate generality across realistic experimental scenarios, including phase-resolved decomposition of a multiphase Ti--15Nb thin film, quantitative recovery of \ce{NaCl}--\ce{Li2CO3} mixture compositions, separation of crystalline peaks from amorphous halos in semicrystalline polymers, high-throughput operando lattice tracking in layered cathodes, automated refinement of a compositionally disordered Ru--Mn oxide solid solution (CCDC 2530452), and quantitative phase-resolved deciphering of an ancient Egyptian make-up sample from synchrotron powder XRD. By providing Bragg-consistent, uncertainty-aware intensity partitioning as a refinement-ready interface, WPEM closes the gap between AI-generated hypotheses and diffraction-admissible structure refinement on challenging XRD data.

AI.tldr: WPEM：基于物理约束的全谱分解与精修工作流，通过将布拉格定律作为显式约束，在严重重叠区域稳定分配峰强度，为AI生成的候选结构提供可精修的接口。
AI.motivation: 人工智能可以快速从X射线衍射数据中提出候选相和结构，但这些假设在下游精修中经常失败，因为峰强度在严重重叠下无法稳定分配，且衍射一致性约束较弱。
AI.method: WPEM将布拉格定律作为批处理期望最大化框架中的显式约束，将全谱建模为概率混合密度，迭代推断组分分辨强度同时保持峰中心布拉格一致性，产生连续、物理可接受的强度表示。
AI.result: 在标准参考图案（PbSO4和Tb2BaCoO5）上，WPEM在匹配精修条件下比广泛使用的软件（FullProf和TOPAS）获得更低的Rp/Rwp。在多种实际实验场景中均表现出良好性能。
AI.conclusion: WPEM通过提供布拉格一致、不确定性感知的强度分配作为精修就绪接口，弥合了AI生成假设与具有挑战性的XRD数据的衍射可接受结构精修之间的差距。

title: When Is Structural Lubricity Load Independent? The Role of Contact Geometry and Elastic Compliance
summary: Using molecular dynamics simulations of an incommensurate Au(111)/graphite interface, we investigate the conditions under which structural lubricity produces load-independent friction. We show that strict load independence occurs only in laterally infinite, area-filling contacts, where dissipation is governed by phonon-mediated viscous coupling and the shear stress scales linearly with sliding velocity. Finite contacts with explicit boundary terminations exhibit substantially higher friction yet remain load independent up to a critical load. Load dependence arises only when elastic out-of-plane deformation near the contact line exceeds a critical amplitude, activating additional dissipation channels. These results demonstrate that contact geometry and local elastic compliance, rather than normal load itself, determine the onset and breakdown of load-independent structural lubricity.

AI.tldr: 通过分子动力学模拟研究非公度Au(111)/石墨界面的结构润滑条件，发现严格负载无关摩擦仅存在于无限大接触面，有限接触面在临界负载前保持负载无关，负载相关性源于接触线附近的弹性变形激活额外耗散通道。
AI.motivation: 研究结构润滑中负载无关摩擦的条件和机制，理解接触几何和弹性变形如何影响摩擦行为，而非仅关注负载本身。
AI.method: 使用分子动力学模拟非公度Au(111)/石墨界面，分析无限大接触面和有限接触面的摩擦行为，研究弹性变形与负载相关性的关系。
AI.result: 严格负载无关摩擦仅存在于无限大接触面，有限接触面在临界负载前保持负载无关，负载相关性源于接触线附近弹性变形超过临界振幅时激活额外耗散通道。
AI.conclusion: 接触几何和局部弹性柔度，而非负载本身，决定了负载无关结构润滑的出现和破坏，为理解纳米尺度摩擦机制提供了新视角。

title: Thermal Decoherence and Population Transfer of MeV Channeling Electrons in Diamond
summary: Channeling radiation in oriented crystals arises from transitions between quantized transverse bound states in the MeV regime and is strongly affected by thermal diffuse scattering through population transfer and decoherence. A frozen-phonon multislice propagation framework is developed to track a reduced transverse Hilbert space spanned by selected bound-state manifolds using configuration-resolved projection amplitudes. Beyond reproducing transition energies, the method yields reduced manifold density matrices, thermal population kinetics, and depth-resolved coherence metrics. Applied to axial electron channeling in $\langle100\rangle$ diamond at 16.9 MeV, the results show approximately exponential population loss with strongly state-dependent feeding among low-lying manifolds. For an initial coherent superposition in the degenerate 2p manifold, the intra-manifold purity relaxes toward the maximally mixed limit, consistent with thermally induced random basis rotations. Under 1s initial excitation, population transferred into the 2p and 3d manifolds remains close to maximally mixed, while weak cross-manifold coherences persist. The framework enables quantitative analysis of thermal population dynamics, decoherence, and their links to spontaneous and coherently driven emission observables across a broad range of crystal structures.

AI.tldr: 该论文开发了冻结声子多切片传播框架，用于分析晶体中兆电子伏特能级横向束缚态之间的跃迁辐射，特别关注热扩散散射对布居转移和退相干的影响。
AI.motivation: 研究晶体中定向辐射的量子动力学，特别是热扩散散射如何通过布居转移和退相干影响兆电子伏特能级的横向束缚态跃迁，这对于理解晶体辐射过程和开发相关应用至关重要。
AI.method: 开发了冻结声子多切片传播框架，通过配置分辨投影振幅跟踪选定束缚态流形张成的简化横向希尔伯特空间，能够计算流形密度矩阵、热布居动力学和深度分辨相干性度量。
AI.result: 应用于16.9 MeV电子在⟨100⟩金刚石中的轴向沟道，结果显示低能流形间存在强烈状态依赖的布居转移和近似指数布居损失；对于初始相干叠加态，流形内纯度向最大混合极限弛豫；1s初始激发下，转移到2p和3d流形的布居保持接近最大混合状态，同时存在弱跨流形相干性。
AI.conclusion: 该框架能够定量分析热布居动力学和退相干过程，并将其与自发和相干驱动辐射观测联系起来，适用于广泛的晶体结构分析，为晶体辐射过程的深入理解提供了有力工具。

title: The rise and fall of an oxide: insights into the phase diagram of bismuth oxide on Au(111)
summary: Bismuth oxide (Bi$_2$O$_3$) is a polymorphic material of considerable technological interest, with applications spanning from heterogeneous catalysis to next-generation nanoelectronics. Despite its relevance, systematic investigations of Bi$_2$O$_3$ thin films remain scarce. Here, we report a comprehensive, multi-technique study of bismuth oxide grown on Au(111). By combining synchrotron-based x-ray photoelectron spectroscopy and diffraction with low-energy electron diffraction and scanning tunneling microscopy, we elucidate the structural evolution of the surface during controlled oxidation and subsequent annealing. We find that Bi deposition induces well-defined surface reconstructions, whereas oxidation triggers the formation of a complex sequence of Bi$_2$O$_3$ domains. High-resolution spectroscopic and diffraction data enable us to propose a structural model consistent with the $(201)$ surface of $β$-Bi$_2$O$_3$. In addition, work function measurements reveal substantial electronic modifications at the interface. These results provide benchmark structural and electronic insights into the Bi oxide/Au(111) system and establish a framework for integrating Bi$_2$O$_3$ in devices in combination to two-dimensional semiconductors exploiting its low contact resistance.

AI.tldr: 该研究通过多种表征技术系统研究了Bi₂O₃在Au(111)上的生长过程，揭示了其结构演化和界面电子特性，为Bi₂O₃在纳米电子器件中的应用提供了基准数据。
AI.motivation: Bi₂O₃作为一种多晶型材料，在异相催化和下一代纳米电子学中具有重要应用价值，但对其薄膜的系统研究仍然缺乏。本研究旨在填补这一空白，为Bi₂O₃在器件集成中提供基础理解。
AI.method: 采用多种表征技术相结合的方法：同步辐射X射线光电子能谱和衍射、低能电子衍射、扫描隧道显微镜，以及功函数测量。通过控制氧化和后续退火过程，系统研究表面结构演化。
AI.result: 发现Bi沉积诱导了明确的表面重构，氧化则触发了复杂的Bi₂O₃畴结构序列。高分辨率光谱和衍射数据支持提出的β-Bi₂O₃(201)表面结构模型。功函数测量揭示了界面处显著的电子修饰。
AI.conclusion: 该研究为Bi₂O₃/Au(111)体系提供了基准的结构和电子学见解，建立了将Bi₂O₃与二维半导体集成的框架，利用其低接触电阻特性，为未来纳米电子器件应用奠定了基础。

title: Addressing Ill-conditioning in Density Functional Theory for Reliable Machine Learning
summary: In principle, machine learning (ML) can be used to obtain any electronic property of a many-body system from its electron density within density functional theory. However, some physical quantities are highly sensitive to small variations in the density. This 'ill-conditioning' limits the accuracy with which these quantities can be learned as density functionals from a fixed amount of data. We identify sources of ill-conditioning present in density functionals that belong to two ubiquitous classes: 1) Physical quantities that are globally gauge-dependent, meaning they change value if a constant shift is applied to the external potential -- for example, the total energy; 2) Functionals of the N-electron density that have an implicit dependence on the (N+1)-electron density, such as the fundamental gap. We demonstrate that widely used ML models exhibit orders-of-magnitude greater error when applied to these ill-conditioned density functionals compared to other functionals that fall into neither class, even when the global gauge is fixed to prevent constant shifts. Owing to an absence of ill-conditioning in potential functionals, we find that providing the external potential as input to the ML model leads to significantly improved predictions of quantities in these two classes.

AI.tldr: 机器学习学习密度泛函时，某些物理量对电子密度的微小变化高度敏感（病态条件），导致学习精度受限。研究发现两类病态泛函：全局规范依赖量（如总能）和隐含(N+1)-电子密度依赖的泛函（如能隙）。提供外势作为输入可显著改善预测。
AI.motivation: 机器学习可用于从电子密度预测多体系统的电子性质，但某些物理量对密度的微小变化高度敏感，这种"病态条件"限制了从有限数据中学习密度泛函的精度。需要识别病态条件的来源并寻找解决方案。
AI.method: 识别了两类病态密度泛函：1) 全局规范依赖的物理量（如总能，随外势常数平移而变化）；2) 隐含(N+1)-电子密度依赖的泛函（如基本能隙）。通过比较机器学习模型在病态和非病态泛函上的表现，并测试提供外势作为输入对预测的改善效果。
AI.result: 广泛使用的机器学习模型在应用于这两类病态密度泛函时，误差比其他非病态泛函高出数个数量级，即使固定全局规范防止常数平移。由于势泛函不存在病态条件，提供外势作为机器学习输入可显著改善这两类量的预测精度。
AI.conclusion: 密度泛函的病态条件限制了机器学习学习某些关键物理量的精度。识别了两类病态泛函，并证明通过提供外势作为输入（利用势泛函无病态条件的优势）可有效克服这一限制，为准确学习敏感电子性质提供了新途径。

title: Stoichiometry Dependent Properties of Cerium Hydride: An Active Learning Developed Interatomic Potential Study
summary: Cerium hydride has a variety of interesting properties, including a known lattice contraction and densification with increasing hydrogen content. However, precise stoichiometric control is not experimentally straightforward and {\it ab initio} approaches are not computationally feasible for many properties such as melting and low temperature diffusion. Therefore, we develop a machine-learned interatomic potential for cerium hydride that is valid for H to Ce ratios from 2.0 to 3.0. A query-by-committee active learning approach is used to develop the training set. Leveraging classical molecular dynamics simulations, we assess a range of properties and provide fundamental mechanisms for the trends with stoichiometry. A majority of the properties follow the trend of lattice contraction, being governed by the stronger lattice binding induced by adding octahedral atoms.

AI.tldr: 开发了铈氢化物机器学习原子间势能，用于研究H/Ce比为2.0-3.0范围内的性质，通过主动学习训练，揭示晶格收缩趋势的机制
AI.motivation: 铈氢化物具有有趣性质，但实验上精确控制化学计量比困难，从头算方法计算熔化和低温扩散等性质不可行，需要开发有效的计算模型
AI.method: 采用查询委员会主动学习方法开发训练集，构建机器学习原子间势能，利用经典分子动力学模拟评估性质
AI.result: 开发了适用于H/Ce比2.0-3.0的铈氢化物势能，揭示了大多数性质遵循晶格收缩趋势，由添加八面体位原子引起的更强晶格结合主导
AI.conclusion: 机器学习原子间势能为铈氢化物研究提供了有效工具，揭示了化学计量比对性质的系统影响机制

title: Universal Framework for Decomposing Ionic Transport into Interpretable Mechanisms
summary: Understanding mechanisms of ion transport in bulk materials is central to designing next-generation ion conductors for energy storage devices, yet studies employing all-atom molecular dynamics (MD) have largely been limited to reporting overall transport coefficients without a quantitative, spatiotemporally resolved breakdown of \emph{how} charge is carried. We present a computational framework that analyzes MD trajectories to quantitatively interpret macroscopic transport by decomposing it into additive contributions from physically motivated events. They are defined either through heuristically identified microscopic transitions, capturing events such as single-ion hops, multi-ion hops, and vehicular motion, or through transitions between chemically interpretable coordination macrostates. The construction guarantees that attributed contributions sum exactly to the Onsager transport coefficients estimated via the Green-Kubo/Einstein formalism, while scanning the sampling window exposes characteristic temporal scales at which distinct transport mechanisms emerge and dominate. Applied across three prototypical electrolytes-inorganic crystals, liquids, and polymers-the framework quantitatively resolves long-standing debates (e.g., the role of concerted motion and exchange), identifies dominant mechanisms and rate-limiting steps, quantifies their frequencies and effectiveness, and extracts activation energies for distinct transport modes, thereby distilling design rules for fast conduction. This general and reproducible analysis tool turns MD trajectories into quantitative mechanism maps, enabling the ion-conductor community to adjudicate mechanistic hypotheses and accelerate discovery.

AI.tldr: 开发了一个计算框架，将分子动力学轨迹分解为物理事件，定量解析离子传输机制，应用于多种电解质系统。
AI.motivation: 传统分子动力学研究主要报告整体传输系数，缺乏对电荷传输机制的定量、时空分辨分析，需要工具来解析离子传输的微观机制。
AI.method: 提出计算框架，通过启发式识别的微观跃迁（单离子跳跃、多离子跳跃、载体运动）或化学可解释的配位宏状态之间的跃迁，将宏观传输分解为可加性贡献。
AI.result: 应用于三种典型电解质（无机晶体、液体、聚合物），定量解决了长期争议（如协同运动和交换的作用），识别了主导机制和限速步骤，量化了频率和效率，提取了不同传输模式的活化能。
AI.conclusion: 该通用且可重复的分析工具将分子动力学轨迹转化为定量机制图，使离子导体领域能够评估机制假设并加速发现，为快速传导提供设计规则。

title: Growth and crystallographic structure of TiTe$_2$ on Au(111): From sub-monolayer structures to single- and multi-layer films
summary: We investigated the initial growth of TiTe$_2$ on Au(111) from sub-monolayer to multi-layer coverage by scanning tunneling microscopy (STM), low-energy electron diffraction intensity analysis (LEED-IV), and density functional theory (DFT). In the submonolayer regime we find a stable and well-ordered $(5\times\sqrt{3})_{\mathrm{rect}}$ superstructure consisting of separated TiTe$_2$ molecules, whereby the Ti atoms substitute Au atoms of the first substrate layer as proven by LEED-IV. By adding further Ti and Te in a 1:2 ratio and proper annealing dealloying sets in and a homogeneous 1T-TiTe$_2$ monolayer film on an unreconstructed substrate is formed. The resulting moiré structure is close to a $(4 \times 4)$ superstructure w.r.t. Au(111) and has a slightly expanded in-plane lattice parameter compared to the 1T-TiTe$_2$ bulk value. With further stoichiometric deposition, thicker 1T-TiTe$_2$ films grow. Surprisingly, a five layer thick film exhibits an even larger lattice-parameter (1.5 % larger than the bulk value). All LEED-IV analyses are based on best-fit R-factors of $R \le 0.13$.

AI.tldr: 研究TiTe₂在Au(111)上的初始生长过程，从亚单层到多层覆盖，发现不同覆盖度下形成不同的超结构和晶格参数变化
AI.motivation: 研究过渡金属二硫化物TiTe₂在金属基底Au(111)上的初始生长机制，了解其结构演化和界面相互作用
AI.method: 使用扫描隧道显微镜(STM)、低能电子衍射强度分析(LEED-IV)和密度泛函理论(DFT)相结合的方法
AI.result: 亚单层形成(5×√3)rect超结构，Ti原子替代Au原子；单层形成接近(4×4)的莫尔结构，晶格参数略大于体材料；五层薄膜晶格参数比体材料大1.5%

title: Understanding the kinetics of static recrystallization in Mg-Zn-Ca alloys using an integrated PRISMS simulation framework
comment: 37 pages, 12 figures. Includes Supplementary Information section
summary: Recrystallization is a phenomenon in which a plastically deformed polycrystalline microstructure with a high dislocation density transforms into another that has low dislocation density. This evolution is driven by the stored energy in dislocations, rather than grain growth driven by grain boundary energy alone. One difficulty in quantitative modeling of recrystallization is the uncertainty in material parameters, which can be addressed by integration of experimental data into simulations. In this work, we compare simulated static recrystallization dynamics of a Mg-3Zn-0.1Ca wt.% alloy to experiments involving thermomechanical processing followed by measurements of the recrystallization fraction over time. The simulations are performed by combining PRISMS software for crystal plasticity and phase-field models (PRISMS-Plasticity and PRISMS-PF, respectively) in an integrated computational materials engineering framework. At 20% strain and annealing at 350 °C, the model accurately describes recrystallization dynamics up to a mobility-dependent time scale factor. While the average grain boundary mobility and the fraction of plastic work converted into stored energy are not precisely known, by fitting simulations to experimental data, we show that the average grain boundary mobility can be determined if the fraction of plastic work converted to stored energy is known, or vice versa. For low annealing temperatures, we observe a discrepancy between the model and experiments in the late stages of recrystallization, where a slowdown in recrystallization kinetics occurs in the experiments. We discuss possible sources of this slowdown and propose additional physical mechanisms that need to be accounted for in the model to improve its predictions.

AI.tldr: 通过结合晶体塑性和相场模型模拟镁合金静态再结晶动力学，与实验数据对比，揭示了晶界迁移率与储存能量分数之间的相互依赖性，并发现低温退火后期再结晶动力学减缓的现象。
AI.motivation: 再结晶定量建模面临材料参数不确定性的挑战，需要通过实验数据与模拟的整合来解决。本研究旨在通过比较镁合金的模拟与实验再结晶动力学，验证集成计算材料工程框架的准确性。
AI.method: 使用PRISMS软件集成晶体塑性模型（PRISMS-Plasticity）和相场模型（PRISMS-PF），模拟Mg-3Zn-0.1Ca wt.%合金在20%应变和350°C退火条件下的静态再结晶动力学，并与热机械处理后测量的再结晶分数随时间变化实验数据对比。
AI.result: 模型在350°C退火条件下能准确描述再结晶动力学（需考虑迁移率相关的时间尺度因子）。通过拟合模拟与实验数据，发现平均晶界迁移率与塑性功转化为储存能量的分数之间存在相互依赖性：已知其中一个参数可确定另一个。低温退火后期实验中观察到再结晶动力学减缓，与模型预测存在差异。
AI.conclusion: 集成计算材料工程框架能有效模拟再结晶过程，但需考虑低温退火后期再结晶动力学减缓的物理机制。未来模型改进需纳入额外的物理机制以更准确预测再结晶行为。
